name: NanoCMS
tagline: Edit SQLite databases on your Mac
body:
# NanoCMS ### Introduction: NanoCMS is a very simple OSX app that can edit SQLite database's ### Features: - Free and OpenSource - Tiny footprint only 0.25mb - 100% hack Proof ### Example: id | first-name | last-name | title | age --- | ---------- | ----------| ----- | --- 1 | Oliver | Knight | Quant | 25 2 | Michael | Smiht | Analyst | 33 Update --> Row value --> Choose row --> Choose value --> "Smith"
Update --> Swap row --> Swap from: "title" --> Swap to: "age" id | first-name | last-name | age | title --- | ---------- | ----------| --- | ----- 1 | Oliver | Knight | 25 | Quant 2 | Michael | Smith | 33 | Analyst
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
